item.title: JASMIN User Conference 2025
item.description: Join us for the JASMIN user conference at RAL on the Harwell Campus in Oxfordshire on Tuesday 10th and Wednesday 11th June 2025.

item.title: JASMIN User Conference 2025 - save the dates
item.description: We will be hosting the next JASMIN conference at RAL on the Harwell Campus in Oxfordshire on Tuesday 10th and Wednesday 11th June 2025.

item.title: Registration still open for NCAS’ Early Career Staff Symposium on 20th-21st March 2024!
item.description: The National Centre for Atmospheric Science (NCAS) are hosting the first Harmony in the Skies: Bridging Horizons in Atmospheric Science symposium for the early career atmospheric science community!
